ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of RAYMOND E. IVANY, O.N.S., of Wolfville, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 29, 2024.
